content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":72451,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それなら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In that case...\""},{"lineNumber":72452,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、クルックー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Kukurukoo?\""},{"lineNumber":72453,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーは部屋を見回す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kukurukoo looked around the room."},{"lineNumber":72454,"originalJapaneseLine":"その瞳は真剣そのものだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Her eyes were utterly serious."},{"lineNumber":72455,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そこです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There.\""},{"lineNumber":72456,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ああ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":72457,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーが手を伸ばして空中を『掴んだ』。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kukurukoo reached out and 'grabbed' at the air."},{"lineNumber":72458,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":72459,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぼう、と――","translatedEnglishLine":"With a poof—"},{"lineNumber":72460,"originalJapaneseLine":"その場にシィルが現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheer appeared right there."},{"lineNumber":72461,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……え、あれ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Eh, that?\""},{"lineNumber":72462,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、シィル！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-No, Sheer!?\""},{"lineNumber":72463,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う〜〜〜ん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uuuuun...\""},{"lineNumber":72464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あれ？　私？　どうして？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh? Me? Why?\""},{"lineNumber":72465,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、クルックーさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Kukurukoo-san.\""},{"lineNumber":72466,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふわふわ浮いているシィルの体はスケスケだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheer's body, floating lightly, was completely translucent."},{"lineNumber":72467,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、これは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-This is...\""},{"lineNumber":72468,"originalJapaneseLine":"「幽霊ですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A ghost.\""},{"lineNumber":72469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、こ、こ、こ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gh-gh-gh-gh...\""},{"lineNumber":72470,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こここここここ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gho-gho-gho-gho-gho...\""},{"lineNumber":72471,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こらーーーーッ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey!!!\""},{"lineNumber":72472,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なにを勝手に死んでるかーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"What do you mean dying on your own like that!!!\""},{"lineNumber":72473,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":72474,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あ……はあ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, ah... haa...\""},{"lineNumber":72475,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すみません……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sorry...\""},{"lineNumber":72476,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むぐ……なんかボーッとしてるな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mugh... you seem kind of out of it...\""},{"lineNumber":72477,"originalJapaneseLine":"「死んだばかりで頭がついてきていないのでしょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You probably just died and your mind hasn't caught up yet.\""},{"lineNumber":72478,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーと、シィルさんの死体はこちらですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, Sheer's corpse is right inside.\""},{"lineNumber":72480,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃああああ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaaah!?\""},{"lineNumber":72481,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐにーっと、クルックーがシィルの霊体を","translatedEnglishLine":"With a squish, Kukurukoo pushed Sheer's spirit body"},{"lineNumber":72482,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルの死体に詰め込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"back into Sheer's corpse."},{"lineNumber":72483,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あ、あれ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ah, huh?\""},{"lineNumber":72484,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルの死体がむくりと起き上がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheer's corpse sat up with a jerk."},{"lineNumber":72485,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、生き返……った……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I'm reviv...ed...\""},{"lineNumber":72486,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっと、私どうして……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, why am I...?"},{"lineNumber":72487,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様に怒られていたような……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems I was being scolded by Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":72488,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、お前……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-you...\""},{"lineNumber":72489,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ランス様……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Lord Kukurukoo."},{"lineNumber":72495,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これはいったい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"What exactly is up,"},{"lineNumber":72497,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魂が定着していないんだと思います」","translatedEnglishLine":"and I think her soul hasn't settled yet.\""},{"lineNumber":72498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「定着？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Settled?\""},{"lineNumber":72499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「氷柱から出て来たばかりで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She just came out of the icicle,"},{"lineNumber":72500,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何が起こるか分からないということです」","translatedEnglishLine":"so we don't know what might happen.\""},{"lineNumber":72501,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかく強い衝撃は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway, we shouldn't give her any strong shocks.\""},{"lineNumber":72502,"originalJapaneseLine":"　与えてはいけないということですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's what it means.\""},{"lineNumber":72503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そんなことがあるのか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I didn't know such a thing could happen...\""},{"lineNumber":72504,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、心配しなくても、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, don't worry,"},{"lineNumber":72505,"originalJapaneseLine":"　しばらくすれば定着します」","translatedEnglishLine":"her soul will settle after a while.\""},{"lineNumber":72506,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むむむう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mummmmm...\""},{"lineNumber":72507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの？　ランス様？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, Lord Rance?"},{"lineNumber":72508,"originalJapaneseLine":"　怖い顔してらっしゃいますが、","translatedEnglishLine":"You have quite a scary look on your face,"},{"lineNumber":72509,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何があったのでしょう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"What happened...?"},{"lineNumber":72510,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーは部屋を見回す。
その瞳は真剣そのものだった。
クルックーが手を伸ばして空中を『掴んだ』。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kukurukoo reached out and 'grabbed' at the air.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場にシィルが現れる。
ふわふわ浮いているシィルの体はスケスケだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheer's body, floating lightly, was completely translucent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにを勝手に死んでるかーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What do you mean dying on your own like that!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むぐ……なんかボーッとしてるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mugh... you seem kind of out of it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死んだばかりで頭がついてきていないのでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You probably just died and your mind hasn't caught up yet."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、シィルさんの死体はこちらですね」
ぐにーっと、クルックーがシィルの霊体を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a squish, Kukurukoo pushed Sheer's spirit body

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの死体に詰め込んだ。
シィルの死体がむくりと起き上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheer's corpse sat up with a jerk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様に怒られていたような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems I was being scolded by Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、いったいなにがどうなって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What on earth happened to me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス、シィルさんはまだ起きたばかりで、
魂が定着していないんだと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I think her soul hasn't settled yet."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「氷柱から出て来たばかりで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She just came out of the icicle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何が起こるか分からないということです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we don't know what might happen."
"Anyway, we shouldn't give her any strong shocks."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 与えてはいけないということですね」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I didn't know such a thing could happen..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくすれば定着します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her soul will settle after a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怖い顔してらっしゃいますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have quite a scary look on your face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何があったのでしょう……」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーは部屋を見回す。
その瞳は真剣そのものだった。
クルックーが手を伸ばして空中を『掴んだ』。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kukurukoo reached out and 'grabbed' at the air.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場にシィルが現れる。
ふわふわ浮いているシィルの体はスケスケだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheer's body, floating lightly, was completely translucent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにを勝手に死んでるかーーーッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What do you mean dying on your own like that!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むぐ……なんかボーッとしてるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mugh... you seem kind of out of it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「死んだばかりで頭がついてきていないのでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You probably just died and your mind hasn't caught up yet."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えーと、シィルさんの死体はこちらですね」
ぐにーっと、クルックーがシィルの霊体を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a squish, Kukurukoo pushed Sheer's spirit body

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの死体に詰め込んだ。
シィルの死体がむくりと起き上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheer's corpse sat up with a jerk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様に怒られていたような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems I was being scolded by Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、いったいなにがどうなって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What on earth happened to me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス、シィルさんはまだ起きたばかりで、
魂が定着していないんだと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I think her soul hasn't settled yet."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「氷柱から出て来たばかりで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She just came out of the icicle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何が起こるか分からないということです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we don't know what might happen."
"Anyway, we shouldn't give her any strong shocks."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 与えてはいけないということですね」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I didn't know such a thing could happen..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくすれば定着します」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: her soul will settle after a while."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怖い顔してらっしゃいますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have quite a scary look on your face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何があったのでしょう……」
